file_content.text: What happened to Uphrades is horrible, but it's over. There's nothing we can do.
That was the last of the Imperials. You're safe now.
Not a minute too soon. Those commandos weren't taking prisoners.
I still can't believe what happened to Uphrades. When we arrived, an Imperial warship was attacking the planet. I've never seen anything like it.
Uphrades was trapped inside an energy field. Some starships tried to flee, but their engines failed before they could leave the atmosphere.
No one escaped. Every ship that tried crashed back onto the surface.
The enemy made sure there wouldn't be survivors.
That's horrible.
How did your ship come under attack?
And what happened to you?
You stood by and watched all this? Pathetic.
You cowards didn't fight back?
We're a flying medcenter, for pity's sake. What could we do?
We tried to run, but Imperial boarding pods overtook us.
I saw Uphrades's atmosphere catch fire. Horrific destruction....
Flames consumed the planet. Everything turned to smoke and ash in seconds....
What happened to the Imperial warship?
I'm hunting who did this.
It jumped to hyperspace. No telling where it is now.
Could anyone have escaped the destruction?
There were no survivors?
I don't see how.
Captain, look at this....
I'll say one thing for Darth Angral: he's efficient.
Quite a weapon.
So efficient, there's nothing left to do here.
That may not be true.
Our sensors detect faint life readings on the planet's surface--possible survivors.
Anyone left on that planet is as good as dead.
If we go down there, we can provide food, water, shelter and medicine. It's our duty.
The energy field surrounding Uphrades will destroy your ship's engines. You won't be able to leave.
Energy field = impassable to starships // Medical frigate landing on Uphrades = trapped there
You saw the other ships. If we go down there, we'll never take off again.
We can't abandon the survivors.
Innocent people are dying.
You could hold out a long time in this ship. Long enough for the Republic to make Uphrades safe again.
Not necessarily.
We're the only hope those people have. Every second counts.
Please, he'll listen to you. Talk to him.
The Republic needs all its medical frigates--and we don't know what's down there.
Landing isn't worth the risk.
I'm not getting trapped on that ash-ball over a lucky herd of rontos.
Then I'll invoke my emergency authority and assume command of this ship.
Let me talk to this Jedi. See if there's really a chance people could be alive....
It's not that I don't want to help--but I have a family to think about.
This ship carries combat-grade kolto packs, battle adrenals, you name it.
Talk her out of this crazy idea. You'll have your pick of our supplies.
You convince Doctor Senessa to stand down, and I'll give you whatever you want.
I've pinpointed the strongest life signs. We can land immediately.
Well? What's it going to be?
Render aid to anyone you find. I promise you won't be abandoned down there.
Go help any survivors.
This is insane. I'm taking an escape pod off this lunatic asylum....
Captain Dal just tried to bribe me. He should be removed from command.
The captain is a crook.
Captain, how could you? You swore an oath.
I'm invoking my emergency authority and relieving you of command. Get off my bridge.
I'd rather take my chances with a military tribunal than with whatever's down there. I'm leaving in an escape pod....
My crew can do this without him. Thank you for doing what's right.
I'm transmitting our sensor logs of the attack to your ship. Please give them to Republic High Command.
You'd better go. People on Uphrades need us.
Listen to me. I'm a Jedi. If there was anyone alive down there, I'd sense it.
[Lie] There are no survivors.
There's nothing you can do for Uphrades. Let it go.
If the Empire's restarting the war, we'll be needed out there.
We've served together for years, doctor. Don't you trust me by now?
You're right. I'm clutching at false hope. Excuse me....
Here, this will unlock the ship's medstores. I'll just report them as lost during the boarding action.
You did the right thing. Thank you.
Those Imperial soldiers would have killed us all. Thank you.
